profile.name: Kent C. Dodds
profile.bio: Improving 🌎 with quality software. Husband, 5x Dad, Latter-day Saint. Dev Educator, MVP. Creator of @EpicWebDev & @EpicReactDev. Exploring #React, #AI. Learn in public! 🚀

tweets.content: Just pushed a massive update to the 'Data Fetching Patterns' module on EpicWeb.dev! We're diving deep into Remix loaders, server components, and client-side strategies. So much goodness to unpack! 🚀 #EpicWeb #RemixRun

The argument against `strict` mode in TypeScript often boils down to 'it's too much work.' But that 'work' is exactly where you catch bugs and solidify your understanding. Pay the tax upfront, save huge later. #TypeScript
Just spent 30 minutes debugging an issue only to realize I had a typo in an environment variable name. It's not a bug, it's a feature... of my personal error log. 🤦‍♂️ #DebuggingLife

Huge thanks to @community_member for their recent PR to `some-utility-library`! Open source thrives on these contributions. Remember, every little bit helps improve the ecosystem for everyone. Keep building! ✨ #OpenSource

Had a great time chatting with the team at [Fictional Company] about building resilient React apps yesterday. Always energizing to share knowledge and learn from others' perspectives. Grateful for opportunities to connect! 🙏

The React ecosystem moves fast, but the core principles of component composition and state management remain timeless. Don't chase every shiny new thing; master the fundamentals, then explore. #React #WebDev

It's incredible to see how many people are using EpicWeb.dev and EpicReact.dev to grow their skills. Witnessing your 'aha!' moments is the greatest reward. Thank you for being on this journey with me! 🙏

Today's reminder: 'We can lift ourselves and others by living a consecrated life.' - Elder Ulisses Soares. Simple, powerful truth that resonates in all aspects of life. Happy Sunday, friends. #LDS #SundayThoughts

Curious about how AI can genuinely boost your dev workflow, not just generate boilerplate? My new material on EpicAI.pro covers practical, hands-on strategies. Stop guessing, start building smarter! 💡 #EpicAI #AIforDevs

If your testing strategy doesn't actively help you refactor with confidence, it's not a *good* testing strategy. It's just busywork. Focus on integration tests that mimic user behavior. #Testing #DevX

One of the best ways to learn a new concept? Teach it. Even if it's just explaining it to your rubber duck. Articulating your understanding reveals gaps and solidifies knowledge. Try it! #DevEducation
Early morning coding session before the house wakes up. There's a special kind of peace in these hours. Prioritizing family time means finding these pockets of focus. 👨‍💻❤️ #WorkLifeBalance #Dad
My kids asked me what I do for work. I told them I spend all day explaining things to a really stubborn computer. They nodded. They get it. 😂 #DevLife #DadJokes

Stop copy-pasting code without understanding it. Seriously. It's a technical debt generator, not a productivity hack. Invest 5 minutes to learn, save 5 hours debugging later. #CodeQuality #BestPractices

Working on some fresh exercises for EpicReact.dev that challenge common assumptions about hooks and state. Get ready to level up your mental model! Who's excited for advanced patterns? ✨ #EpicReact #ReactHooks

Saw the latest dev tool leveraging AI for code suggestions. While impressive, it reinforces the need for strong fundamentals. AI augments, it doesn't replace understanding *why* your code works. Still, very cool! #AI #DevTools

Think about contributing to open source, but feel intimidated? Start small! Fix a typo, update docs, or even just open a thoughtful issue. Every interaction makes the project better. Your input matters! #OpenSource #Community

Me: *writes 100 lines of complex logic*
My compiler: 'Expected ;'
Me: 🤦‍♂️ #DeveloperHumor #CodingLife
